00049 void CtpMap::Initialize() {
00050 
00051     CSG::TrajectoryWriter::RegisterPlugins();
00052     CSG::TrajectoryReader::RegisterPlugins();
00053     CSG::TopologyReader::RegisterPlugins();
00054 
00055     AddProgramOptions() ("topology,t", propt::value<string> (),
00056                          "  topology");
00057     AddProgramOptions() ("coordinates,c", propt::value<string> (),
00058                          "  coordinates or trajectory");
00059     AddProgramOptions() ("segments,s",  propt::value<string> (),
00060                          "  definition of segments and fragments");
00061     AddProgramOptions() ("file,f", propt::value<string> (),
00062                          "  state file");
00063 }
00064 
00065 bool CtpMap::EvaluateOptions() {
00066 
00067     CheckRequired("topology", "Missing topology file");
00068     CheckRequired("segments", "Missing segment definition file");
00069     CheckRequired("coordinates", "Missing trajectory input");
00070     CheckRequired("file", "Missing state file");
00071 
00072     return 1;
00073 }
00074 
00075 void CtpMap::Run() {
00076 
00077     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00078     // Initialize MD2QM Engine and SQLite Db //
00079     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00080 
00081     _outdb = _op_vm["file"].as<string> ();
00082     _statsav.Open(_qmtopol, _outdb);
00083     _statsav.FramesInDatabase();
00084     _statsav.Close();
00085 
00086     string cgfile = _op_vm["segments"].as<string> ();
00087     _md2qm.Initialize(cgfile);
00088 
00089     
00090     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00091     // Create MD topology from file //
00092     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00093 
00094     // Create topology reader
00095     string topfile = _op_vm["topology"].as<string> ();
00096     CSG::TopologyReader *topread;
00097     topread = CSG::TopReaderFactory().Create(topfile);
00098 
00099     if (topread == NULL) {
00100         throw runtime_error( string("Input format not supported: ")
00101                            + _op_vm["top"].as<string> () );
00102     }
00103 
00104     topread->ReadTopology(topfile, this->_mdtopol);
00105     if (TOOLS::globals::verbose) {
00106         cout << "Read MD topology from " << topfile << ": Found "
00107              << _mdtopol.BeadCount() << " atoms in "
00108              << _mdtopol.MoleculeCount() << " molecules. "
00109              << endl;
00110     }
00111 
00112     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00113     // Create MD trajectory from file //
00114     // ++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00115 
00116     // Create trajectory reader and initialize
00117     string trjfile =  _op_vm["coordinates"].as<string> ();
00118     CSG::TrajectoryReader *trjread;
00119     trjread = CSG::TrjReaderFactory().Create(trjfile);
00120 
00121     if (trjread == NULL) {
00122         throw runtime_error( string("Input format not supported: ")
00123                            + _op_vm["coordinates"].as<string> () );
00124     }
00125     trjread->Open(trjfile);
00126     trjread->FirstFrame(this->_mdtopol);
00127 
00128     int    firstFrame = 1;
00129     int    nFrames    = 1;
00130     bool   beginAt    = 0;
00131     double startTime  = _mdtopol.getTime();
00132 
00133     if (_op_vm.count("nframes")) {
00134         nFrames = _op_vm["nframes"].as<int> ();
00135     }
00136     if (_op_vm.count("first-frame")) {
00137         firstFrame = _op_vm["first-frame"].as<int> ();
00138     }    
00139     if (_op_vm.count("begin")) {
00140         beginAt = true;
00141         startTime = _op_vm["begin"].as<double> ();
00142     }
00143 
00144     // Extract first frame specified
00145     bool hasFrame;
00146 
00147     for (hasFrame = true; hasFrame == true;
00148          hasFrame = trjread->NextFrame(this->_mdtopol)) {
00149          if (  ((_mdtopol.getTime() < startTime) && beginAt )
00150                || firstFrame > 1 ) {
00151              firstFrame--;
00152              continue;
00153          }
00154          break;
00155     }
00156     if ( ! hasFrame) {
00157         trjread->Close();
00158         delete trjread;
00159 
00160         throw runtime_error("Time or frame number exceeds trajectory length");
00161     }
00162     
00163     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00164     // Convert MD to QM Topology //
00165     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00166 
00167     for (int saved = 0; hasFrame && saved < nFrames;
00168          hasFrame = trjread->NextFrame(this->_mdtopol), saved++) {
00169 
00170         _md2qm.Md2Qm(&_mdtopol, &_qmtopol);
00171 
00172     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00173     // Save to SQLite State File //
00174     // +++++++++++++++++++++++++ //
00175 
00176         this->Save("");
00177     }
00178 
00179     // trjread->Close();
00180     // delete trjread;
00181 
00182 }
00183 
00184 void CtpMap::Save(string mode) {    
00185     
00186     _statsav.Open(_qmtopol, _outdb);
00187 
00188     _statsav.WriteFrame();
00189 
00190     if (TOOLS::globals::verbose) {
00191         CTP::Topology *TopSQL = NULL;
00192         TopSQL = _statsav.getTopology();
00193         cout << endl << "Checking topology read from SQL file." << endl;
00194         string pdbfile = "system.pdb";
00195         _md2qm.CheckProduct(TopSQL, pdbfile);
00196     }
00197 
00198     _statsav.Close();
00199 
00200 }

00203 int main(int argc, char** argv)
00204 {
00205     CtpMap ctpmap;
00206     return ctpmap.Exec(argc, argv);
